content.body: I am getting confused about entities, named or otherwise. Are any of them necessary, and if so, which ones and in what context? The last list I looked at showed &, <, >, " and ' as still being necessary, but with the exception of < and >, I haven't seen any place where the browser doesn't render the &, " or ' correctly without using the entity.
